overview: Contact 9884228882 for ISO Consultants in Chennai Intelligensia ISO Consultants is a leading consultant in Chennai, Intelligensia ISO Consultancy focused in the intact range of ISO Management System Certification Standards. Intelligensia ISO Consultants offers services for implementing ISO standards like ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 13485, OHSAS 18001, ISO 22000, ISO 27001 etc. Intelligensia ISO Consultants comprised of well trained professionals, Technical experts, responsible staffs, with effective management, which helps the organization in implementing quality standard in accordance with ISO 9001-2008.
